---

title: "Justine"
---

Meet Justine, a singer / song writer that writes from the heart with an honest and
emotional demeanour. Her vocal stylings waver on a blend of folk, jazz, and R&B, with
pipes that can belt out raw emotions. This is her primary instrument, which she
backs up with simplistic guitar rhythms.

Come listen to original music that takes you on a journey into the mind and heart of
this loving artist.
